name: DECA SPORTS FREEDOM
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Spanish. This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  Take sports to the next level with 10 complete sporting events you play using just your own body! Spin, throw, and smash your way to victory across all of the included events: Tennis, Boxing, Archery, Paintball, Beach Volleyball, Dodge Ball, Kendo, Mogul Skiing, Snowboard Cross, and even Figure Skating! You can use your own avatar inside the game and can play with two people at home or with up to four online against people around the world!
